lead_paragraph: Attorney General Ellen Rosenblum said Friday that the United States attorney and other federal officials have asked her to suspend an investigation she began and that she will.

headline.main: Oregon: State Halts Inquiry Into Kitzhaber Administration
headline.print_headline: Oregon: State Halts Inquiry Into Kitzhaber Administration

snippet: Attorney General Ellen Rosenblum said Friday that the United States attorney and other federal officials have asked her to suspend an investigation she began and that she will.
